lang.doc: The two letter language code of the text you wish to submit.  Accepted values are:"en" - English, "es" - Spanish", pt" - Portuguese, "fr" - French, "nl" - Dutch, "de" - German, "it" - Italian.  For ULTRA users with detectlang set to 1, this lang parameter will only be used as a fall back if automatic language detection fails.

text.doc: The text you wish to be classified.  The maximum length is 300 characters.  This string must be UTF-8 encoded (otherwise non-ascii characters will not be recognised properly).

exclude.doc: Any words you wish to exclude to avoid swaying the sentiment detection.  This may be the name of a product for example.  Enter a comma separated string.

detectlang.doc: For subscribers of the ULTRA plan only, when this value is set to 1 Chatterbox will automatically detect the status language.  If it is unable to automatically detect the language, Chatterbox will fall back on the lang parameter.
